long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you customize your character's bag on Raidbots.com. 
It adds additional items in the SimC area used to examine your character with the 'TOP GEAR' feature. 
For instance, it can be useful before picking your weekly item from the vault or to simulate the added value of an item that you don't possess (yet). These items are issued from the latest World of Warcraft expansion - Shadowlands. 

Note: You can add an item with a gem using right-click
Note: I am not the developer of Raidbots.com
